AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bad girl
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: She is a mass-produced girl who had the misfortune to be born into this world by the hands of Carnicurus. All the "Mama" have the same face but each one of them, without exception, believes that she is special and not like other girls.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: good mama
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As the chief scientist of a laboratory floating in space, [PAWN_nameDef] performed many experiments on the life forms she created. \nShe enjoyed toying with carniculus and watching them wallow in pain or pleasure, and later received the same treatment from them.
